metadata.title: CVE-2017-5838 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The gst_date_time_new_from_iso8601_string function in gst/gstdatetime.c in GStreamer before 1.10.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds heap read) via a malformed datetime string.

criterions.comment: gstreamer1.0 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.3-1ubuntu1').
